Package ch.bailu.gtk.glib

Interface OptionArg

public interface OptionArg

https://docs.gtk.org/

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final int
    CALLBACK
    The option provides a callback (of type
    #GOptionArgFunc) to parse the extra argument.
    static final int
    DOUBLE
    The option takes a double argument.
    static final int
    FILENAME
    The option takes a filename as argument, which will
    be in the GLib filename encoding rather than UTF-8.
    static final int
    FILENAME_ARRAY
    The option takes a filename as argument,
    multiple uses of the option are collected into an array of strings.
    static final int
    INT
    The option takes an integer argument.
    static final int
    INT64
    The option takes a 64-bit integer.
    static final int
    NONE
    No extra argument.
    static final int
    STRING
    The option takes a UTF-8 string argument.
    static final int
    STRING_ARRAY
    The option takes a string argument, multiple
    uses of the option are collected into an array of strings.

  • Field Details

    • NONE

      static final int NONE
      No extra argument. This is useful for simple flags or booleans.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • STRING

      static final int STRING
      The option takes a UTF-8 string argument.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • INT

      static final int INT
      The option takes an integer argument.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • CALLBACK

      static final int CALLBACK
      The option provides a callback (of type
      #GOptionArgFunc) to parse the extra argument.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FILENAME

      static final int FILENAME
      The option takes a filename as argument, which will
      be in the GLib filename encoding rather than UTF-8.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • STRING_ARRAY

      static final int STRING_ARRAY
      The option takes a string argument, multiple
      uses of the option are collected into an array of strings.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • FILENAME_ARRAY

      static final int FILENAME_ARRAY
      The option takes a filename as argument,
      multiple uses of the option are collected into an array of strings.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • DOUBLE

      static final int DOUBLE
      The option takes a double argument. The argument
      can be formatted either for the user's locale or for the "C" locale.
      Since 2.12
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • INT64

      static final int INT64
      The option takes a 64-bit integer. Like
      %G_OPTION_ARG_INT but for larger numbers. The number can be in
      decimal base, or in hexadecimal (when prefixed with `0x`, for
      example, `0xffffffff`). Since 2.12
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values
